techmeme.title: Q&A with Marc Benioff on how AI is disrupting work, Salesforce's AI agent platform Agentforce, the Trump administration's tariffs and economic policy, and more (Stephen Morris/Financial Times)
Appfigures: mobile gamers spent $65.4B in 2024, up 4% YoY, but less than $4B went to games released in 2024; studios launched 126K games in 2024, down 43% YoY (Vlad Savov/Bloomberg)

A profile of Tether Chief Investment Officer Richard Heathcote, who manages a $150B asset portfolio and has helped deepen Tether's ties with Cantor Fitzgerald (Ryan Weeks/Bloomberg)
The US Commerce Department issues guidance stating that "using Huawei Ascend chips anywhere in the world violates US export controls" due to the use of US tech (Financial Times)
